message.name: ERR_CANNOT_DELETE_TAB
message.locale: This tab cannot be deleted as it is referenced by the %1s section.

message.name: ERR_TAB_ALREADY_EXISTS_CANNOT_CREATE
message.locale: A tab configuration with an ID of %1s already exists. Please specify a different ID.

message.name: ERR_TAB_CONFIGURATION_ISSUE
message.locale: The tab configuration with ID %1s contains an error.

message.name: ERR_PAGE_REFRESH_OPTIONS_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The refresh options with a page ID of '%1s' already exists. Please specify a different page ID.

message.name: ERR_PAGE_REFRESH_OPTIONS_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: You must specify at least one refresh option for this page.

message.name: ERR_PAGE_PARAM_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A page parameter '%1s' already exists. Please specify a different page parameter name.
